title: Help identifying brushed/hand scripted font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824154335im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mq5kp8KPku1qzabkfo1_1280_5217.jpg)

There's enough constancy in the characters (compare the two 'the's) to make me think its a font and not hand written.  
Can anyone help me identify this?

Thank you
author: magnificenttray
